result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review. Withdrawal of Speedy Trial Demand

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway in court for Denzel Lamont Smiley.  Prosecuting attorney Elaine B. Fehrs in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Jury Trial.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Defense counsel is not prepared for plea hearing at today's court date and waives defendant's speedy jury trial request.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway appeared by video for Denzel Lamont Smiley.  Attorney Elaine B. Fehrs in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Final Pretrial.  Parties advised Court of possible motions but can be be addressed on day of trial.  Case remains calendared for SPEEDY Jury Trial on 10/10/2022 at 9:00 am, Courthouse Room 501.
Received and Filed. State's Supplemental Witness List
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine
Received and Filed. State's Witness List
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion to Suppress Statement
Received and Filed. Defendant's Motions in Limine

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ethan M. Padway appeared by video for Denzel Lamont Smiley.  Attorney Elaine B. Fehrs appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Status Conference held.  Court addressed defendant's speedy trial request.  Defense counsel requests case be set for final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Final pre-trial scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Invoice dated 07/27/2022 invoice #35595 sent to Accts Payable Dept on 08/23/22 in the amount of $781.25 to Dr.Deborah Collins for services on 06/08 & 06/27/22.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND (expires 10/12/2022), filed.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in court with attorney Ethan M. Padway.  Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for return on NGI report.  Parties do not challenge the report, which found no evidence to a reasonable degree of medical certainty that the defendant lacked substantial capacity to understand the wrongfulness of his acts or conform his behavior to the requirements of the law. Defense counsel requests an adjournment to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35. Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Status conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Dr. Collins' Report, filed.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in court with attorney Ethan M. Padway.  Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for return on doctor's report. Doctor requests an extension to file report. Court grants request. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
SMILEY, Denzel DLC NGI EXT LTR, filed.
Order for NGI Examination, signed and filed.
Defense requests NGI evaluation.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.

Court modifies bail to $10,000.00 CASH with Electronic Monitoring.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $15,000.00 CASH.  If Alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. All other previously ordered terms and conditions of bail to continue.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in court with attorney Ethan M. Padway.  Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for bail/bond hearing. Court hears arguments as to bail. For reasons as set forth on the record, Court modifies bail to $10,000.00 CASH with Electronic Monitoring.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $15,000.00 CASH.  If Alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. All other previously ordered terms and conditions of bail to continue. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Motion to Modify Bond, filed.

Attorney Ethan M. Padway in court, defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for scheduling conference. Defense counsel requests a bail/bond hearing on behalf of the defendant. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Letter from defendant re:  bail reduction.  (Denzel L. Smiley, Milwaukee County Jail - Pod 6C/Cell 28, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

CASE HEARD FOR BR. 35:
Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in court with attorney Ethan M. Padway.  Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: P.O. Taylor Zube - MPD.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 35.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Ethan M. Padway in court, defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for hearing. Attorney Padway has been appointed to this case. Court finds good CAUSE to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch PE.
Letter from defendant re:  bail reduction.  (Denzel L. Smiley - #2022000835, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, defendant in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for March 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Preliminary Hearing.  State's witness present in Court.  Defendant does not have representation by the public defenders office at this time.  Court finds GOOD CAUSE to adjourn hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in Court for Preliminary Hearing. SPD has not appointed an attorney on this matter  Preliminary hearing adjourned for cause to: 02-25-2022 at 8:30 a.m., Branch  PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with RRI and her children
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Denzel Lamont Smiley in custody.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Denzel Lamont Smiley appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor counts 3 and 4.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Case is adjourned to Br. PE for Branch 35.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
